channel.title: Hollywood, FL - Calendar - Events
channel.description: Hollywood, FL - Get the latest events

item.title: St. Patrick's Day Parade & Festival
item.description:
Event date: March 15, 2015
Event Time: 12:00 AM - 06:00 PM
Location:
Hollywood Blvd and Harrison St
Hollywood, FL 33020
Description:
We are currently seeking sponsors for the 2015 Parade and Festival set to fill the streets of Downtown Hollywood on March 15th from Noon to 6:00 p.m.

The St. Patrick’s Day Parade & Festival is presented by the Hibernians of Hollywood in partnership with the City of Hollywood. This free event features a traditional float parade, children’s activities, Irish merchandise, food & beverages. An afternoon of free live entertainment headlined by Blackthorn, an Irish Folk Rock band from Philadelphia attracting music folk of all ages and nationalities for almost 25 years.
item.calendarEvent:Location:
Hollywood Blvd and Harrison St
Hollywood, FL 33020

item.title: Food Trucks at ArtsPark
item.description:
Event date: March 16, 2015
Event Time: 05:30 PM - 10:00 PM
Location:
ArtsPark at Young Circle
1 Young Circle
Hollywood, FL 33020
Description:
Bring your chairs, bring your blankets and of course bring your appetite to the Food Trucks at ArtsPark. Open every Monday evening from 5:30 p.m. – 10 p.m. Select from over 20 different food trucks. Visit http://burgerbeast.com/arts-park/ for this week’s truck line-up. Subject to change without notice.
item.calendarEvent:Location:
ArtsPark at Young Circle
1 Young Circle
Hollywood, FL 33020

item.title: Funtastic Friday
item.description:
Event date: March 20, 2015
Event Time: 05:00 PM - 08:00 PM
Location:
ArtsPark at Young Circle
1 Young Circle
Hollywood, FL 33020
Description:
Enjoy family fun with a DJ, face painter, games, bounce houses and more.

Local 10 (WPLG) viewers recently ranked Funtastic Friday # 8 on their "Top 10 Places to Take the Kids" in South Florida list.
item.calendarEvent:Location:
ArtsPark at Young Circle
1 Young Circle
Hollywood, FL 33020

item.title: Friday Fest at Charnow Park : D.J & The Rockers (Classic Rock)
item.description:
Event date: March 20, 2015
Event Time: 07:30 PM - 09:00 PM
Location:
Performance Pavilion at Charnow Park
300 Garfield Street
Hollywood, FL 33020
Description:
Free concerts on Hollywood beach located at Charnow Park, Weather permitting. built in terrace seating . You can also enjoy oceanside dining at the various restaurants located along the Broadwalk.
item.calendarEvent:Location:
Performance Pavilion at Charnow Park
300 Garfield Street
Hollywood, FL 33020

Event Time: 08:00 PM - 10:00 PM
Location:
ArtsPark at Young Circle Amphitheater

Description:

item.title: Hollywood ArtsPark Experience: Americana featuring the Wood Brothers
item.description:
Event date: March 21, 2015
Event Time: 07:00 PM - 11:00 PM
Location:
ArtsPark at Young Circle Amphitheater
1 Young Circle
Hollywood, FL 33020
Description:
The Wood Brothers are a leading Americana and blues band, anchored by Chris (upright bass) and Oliver (acoustic and electric guitars) Wood. Chris is also known for his part in the iconic Medeski Martin & Wood. Opening set by Rachel Goodrich. Free admission. Lawn seating. Bring a blanket or beach chair.
item.calendarEvent:Location:
ArtsPark at Young Circle Amphitheater
1 Young Circle
Hollywood, FL 33020

item.title: Downtown Hollywood ArtWalk
item.description:
Event date: March 21, 2015
Event Time: 07:00 PM - 10:00 PM
Location:
Downtown Hollywood
Hollywood, FL 33020
Description:
Visit galleries and shops in Downtown Hollywood while enjoying art, cultural entertainment, live music, murals and more during ArtWalk on the 3rd Saturday of every month.

item.title: African American Literature
item.description:
Event date: March 24, 2015
Event Time: 06:00 PM - 11:59 PM
Location:
2600 Hollywood Boulevard
Hollywood, FL 33020
Description:
Barry University in association with the City of Hollywood African American Advisory Council will be conducting an interactive workshop series on African American History and Culture. Join for an interactive educational experience in lectures, presentations, film clips, story-telling and role-play. Light refreshments will be served.

item.title: Spring Marshmallow Drop
item.description:
Event date: March 28, 2015
Event Time: 02:00 PM - 06:00 PM
Location:
Boulevard Heights Community Center
6770 Garfield Street
Hollywood, FL 33020
Description:
Event is from 2-6pm, Entertainment, spring tattoos and meet the “Bunny”. Refreshments available for purchase. All children must be accompanied by an adult. 4:15PM – Egg Hunt and games for children ages 3 and under,
5:00PM – Marshmallow Drop for children ages 4 – 12
item.calendarEvent:Location:
Boulevard Heights Community Center
6770 Garfield Street
Hollywood, FL 33020

item.title: ArtsPark Live featuring Classic Rock Therapy (Rock)
item.description:
Event date: March 28, 2015
Event Time: 08:00 PM - 09:30 PM
Location:
ArtsPark at Young Circle
1 Young Circle
Hollywood, FL 33020
Description:
Get your groove on at ARTSPARK LIVE!, a free concert series dedicated to showcasing South Florida's finest talent in the heart of Downtown Hollywood at the new ArtsPark Amphitheater. Enjoy a variety of musical styles at the ArtsPark Amphitheater. Bring your blanket or lawn chair.
item.calendarEvent:Location:
ArtsPark at Young Circle
1 Young Circle
Hollywood, FL 33020
